attributes.title: Phone number required
attributes.review: Can’t use without giving a phone number. Disgraceful.

attributes.title: Absolute no
attributes.review: If I could give this zero stars I would. This drained my phone within MINUTES and it also helped me realize how dirt he’s been as a president.

attributes.title: CRAPPY IT KILLED MY FRIEND
attributes.review: When my friend opened the app he died from trumps ugly face, I also passed out from the ugly face of trump, also trump has ignored corona, ERA, and #blacklivesmatter, therefor he is the worst president in the history of American presidents.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: The app keeps crashing, can’t use it, the app doesn’t work so it’s completely pointless of why to keep it here

attributes.title: I am traumatized ✨
attributes.review: I downloaded the app 😭 and when I opened it I was met by a orange dude and his skin was so saggy 😭✨ please do something abt this, this app is scaring kids all over don’t let this slide under the rug 😭😭😭✨

attributes.title: Cary experience
attributes.review: Once I opened this app bad stuff started this made me cry because now one of my 5 caterpillars died if you value your caterpillars life do not download!

attributes.title: Complete and utter garbage
attributes.review: This app is trash. The president is trash. Our economy is trash. The president prioritize playing golf and hide n’ seek in his bunker rather than focusing his time and energy into the people who need him most!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I download to surport our orange president 🍊🧡 but when I opened it I took so long to load and then the police came to my house don’t recommend ✨

attributes.title: HACKED!!!
attributes.review:
This app STOLE all my credit card information, EMPTIED, my back account. And  NOW every night at 3:33am the app turns on and light my room with orange light!!!
EVERY MORNING the home button is COVERED in Cheeto dust! 1-5 would not recommend. ASTRONOMICAL!

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 🤪🧚✨
attributes.review:
SIKE 
this app made my ears bleed from all the racist, homophobic, xenophobic things the cheeto has said
also no my “50 gender generation” is not a cult we’re just not going to be silenced or go down without a fight
